channel.title: Interface help
channel.description:
Right erm, i need the interface that opens on your screen, After clicking on "donate" in the quest Tab, Eg; Click here to donate, then the interface opens, And has all the donation Info on. If some-one would please Give me it, i would be Very thankful.
Regards.

item.title: Interface help
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:5, topic:400651”][quote author=pot up pls link=topic=497712.msg3639725#msg3639725 date=1308873949]

Oh sorry, I completely misread the topic.

c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("TEXT", 8144);That should do.

Respect Man, thanks alot.

EDIT: How do i Make Text appear into the interface is it this? : c.sendText126("lol", 8145);
[/quote]

c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("text here", 8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("text here...", 8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("here....", 8146); c.getPA().sendFrame126("so on...", 8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("so forth...", 8148);
Like that?
Or am i misreading you’re post?[/quote]

Thanks man.

Read full topic

item.title: Interface help
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“pot up pls, post:4, topic:400651”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=497712.msg3639720#msg3639720 date=1308873784]
Oh sorry, I completely misread the topic.

c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("TEXT", 8144);[/code]That should do.
[/quote]

Respect Man, thanks alot. :)

EDIT: How do i Make Text appear into the interface is it this? : [code]c.sendText126("lol", 8145);[/code][/quote]

[code=java]c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("text here", 8144);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("text here...", 8145);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("here....", 8146);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("so on...", 8147);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("so forth...", 8148);

Like that?
Or am i misreading you’re post?

Read full topic

item.title: Interface help
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

code=Java getPA().showInterface(ID);[/code]Is used to display an interface.

Thanks man, Don’t suppose you know the ID or it Do you?

Read full topic

item.title: Interface help
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

Interfaces are added client-side.

Uhh i’ve forgot what its called, i know the code is like sendframe, or sendinterface, something like that.

Read full topic
